email_chain.subject: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this email finds you well. Following our recent discussion, I am pleased to provide you with a firm freight quote for the shipment of steel coils from Rotterdam to Houston.

Commodity: Steel Coils
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Rotterdam
Discharge Port: Houston
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: MV SEA HORIZON
Freight: USD 85/MT
Laycan: 20-25 October 2023

Please note that this offer is valid for 48 hours. Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the prompt response. USD 85/MT seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider revising the rate to USD 80/MT? Additionally, could you confirm the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Steel Corp

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thank you for your feedback. I can adjust the rate to USD 82/MT, which is the best I can offer at this time. The MV SEA HORIZON has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 225 meters. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

USD 82/MT is still a bit higher than we were hoping for. If you can extend the laycan to 22-27 October, could you consider lowering the rate to USD 80/MT?

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Emily,

I can agree to USD 80/MT with the revised laycan of 22-27 October. Please confirm your acceptance so we can proceed with the recap.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

USD 80/MT works for us. Please send over the recap.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Great! Please find the recap attached.

Commodity: Steel Coils
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Rotterdam
Discharge Port: Houston
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: MV SEA HORIZON
Freight: USD 80/MT
Laycan: 22-27 October 2023
Demurrage: USD 10,000/day pro rata.

Thank you for your business!

Best regards,
Lucas
